titleStmt.title: Laying on of hands upon baptized believers, as such, proved an ordinance of Christ in answer to Mr. Danvers's former book intituled, A treatise of laying on of hands : with a brief answer to a late book called, A treatise concerning laying on of hands, written by a nameless author / by B.K. ...
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, are to be sold by Benj. Harris ...,
